text: Myristica sogeriensis is a flora species in the family Myristicaceae. It is endemic to Papua New Guinea. ==References== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Myristica sogeriensis. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 22 August 2007. Category:Flora of Papua New Guinea sogeriensis Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Myristica sogeriensis
